The Pogost as an institution of Russian rural life existed for nearly a millenium, and in that time it underwent multiple transformations. In many medieval Russian states, Pogosts began as inns and lodging for the nobility and priesthood, but may have doubled as community centers and trading hubs. By the end of the 10th century, however, Pogosts had evolved into administrative and legislative hubs throughout the Slavic states. By 1775 the last Pogost-led administrative district was abolished, and the buildings were repurposed as parishes of the Eastern Orthodox Church.

Licorne is the French name given to the Russian 'unicorn' cannons, named for the distinctively shaped handles on the gun barrels. Devised in 1757, Licornes were a flexible design, easy to fire and transport and made in many differing weights and power. Lighter designs are best remembered from their use as mobile horse artillery, a Russian innovation that would change the European theory of combined arms for the next century.

{TXT_KEY_IMPROVEMENT_VP_ENCAMPMENT_HELP}[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]티피는 전통적으로 동물의 가죽과 나무 막대기로 만들어진 원뿔형 텐트이다. 티피는 북아메리카의 대평원의 유목민 부족들의 야영지에서 사용되었다. 티피는 일반적으로 미국 원주민과 연관되어 있지만, 그레이트 플레인스 이외의 지역에서 온 아메리카 원주민들은 대부분 다른 종류의 주거지를 사용했다. 티피는 내구성이 강하고, 겨울에는 따뜻함과 편안함을 제공하며, 여름의 더위에는 시원하고, 폭우 시에는 건조하다. 티피스는 한 부족이 이주하기로 결정했을 때 빠르게 분해되고 포장될 수 있었고 새로운 지역에 정착했을 때 빠르게 재건될 수 있었다. 이러한 이동성은 유목 생활을 하는 평원 인디언들에게 중요했다. 현대의 티피 커버는 보통 캔버스로 만들어진다. 현대의 티피 이용자는 역사적 재현자, 전원 생활의 신자, 그리고 그들의 유산과 전통의 일부를 보존하고 물려주기를 원하는 집회나 캠프에 참석하는 아메리카 원주민 가족들을 포함한다.

평지 타일에만 건설할 수 있습니다. 다른 티피와 서로 인접하여 건설할 수 없습니다.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE] 시설 위에 주둔한 유닛에 [ICON_STRENGTH]방어력 보너스를 15% 제공하고 인접한 적 유닛에 피해를 [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]5[ENDCOLOR] 입힙니다. (피해는 중첩되지 않습니다) [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]2타일 범위의 모든 쇼쇼니 유닛이 [ICON_STRENGTH]전투력 보너스를 +20% 받습니다.
이 타일에 주둔한 유닛의 [ICON_STRENGTH] 전투력이 +15% 증가합니다. 2타일 이내 쇼쇼니 유닛의[ICON_STRENGTH] 전투력이 +20% 증가합니다. 티피 근처 타일에서 턴을 마치는 적은 피해를 5 입습니다. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]평지 타일에만 건설할 수 있고 다른 티피와 인접하게 건설할 수 없습니다.
현재 타일의 [ICON_FOOD]식량, [ICON_PRODUCTION]생산, [ICON_CULTURE]문화를 증가시킵니다. 건설 시 모든 타일의 특징을 제거합니다. [NEWLINE]근처 쇼숀 유닛에게 전투력을 제공하고 주둔한 유닛에 방어력 보너스를 제공하며 인접한 적 유닛에 소량의 피해를 입힙니다.

Buffalo Pounds were large constructions built by many Plains Tribes for the entrapment and killing of Buffalo. Large herds of buffalo were corralled and funneled into the pound, a sturdy circular ring of hides and wood, where tribesmen could throw spears and other missile weapons from the safety of the walls.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Buffalo were a staple food source on the North American Plains, but hunting such large animals was difficult without horses or sturdy weapons. With the arrival of Europeans and the introduction of the horse and musket, Native American tribes could travel great distances and attack bison herds with impunity. The good times would not last, however, as Europeans encroached upon this way of life. Increasingly, the Great Plains were converted into farms and pastures for American homesteaders. The American buffalo was driven to the brink of extinction by a combination of habitat loss, industrial-scale hunting, and culls engineered to starve the indigenous population.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Today, American buffalo have recovered, but their range has been greatly limited to a few national parks. Commercial farming and sport hunting continues, but the buffalo are unlikely to ever return to their historical numbers.

Yellow Brows (Sh. Ohamupe) were one of two military societies within the Shoshone, playing an integral role in hunting, scouting, and policing within their bands. Yellow Brow braves shaved their heads into a cockscomb 'mohawk', and painted their exposed heads yellow, hence their common English name.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]The Yellow Brows were composed of only the bravest and most daring of the young men, tasked with keeping order on hunting expeditions, scouting, and soldiering. The Society never had more than a few hundred members at a time; members elected their replacement upon graduation. A young Yellow Brow was expected to act and speak in a contrarian way as a sign of membership. For instance, when asked if he would like to join the Yellow Brows, it was expected that the young man would say 'No' as a sign of willingness to join, or 'Yes' if he wished to decline.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]In battle, Yellow Brows were led by a war chief who carried a long cane tipped with a stone or metal dagger. The cane was used to grab and unhorse opponents, or as a No-Retreat signal. If the enemy was gaining the upper hand, the chief would drive his staff into the ground and the braves would defend him to the last. Yellow Brows were banned from leaving their chief's side until another member of the tribe came and released the braves from their charge. Deserting the chief was met with abject mockery, and often resulted in banishment from the tribe.

Often thought of as ceremonial and military implements first, perhaps the greatest contribution of elephants to human society has been as beasts of burden. Elephants are prized as a labour force even in modern times for their ability to haul the dense teak lumber found only in Burma and Thailand. The strength of a fully grown elephant is matched only by its grace, navigating difficult and uneven terrain while carrying heavy loads. With their delicate command of the forest trails, elephants also reduce the potential damage of logging roads to the surrounding forest.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]The jobs of Southeast Asia's working elephants have come under threat within the past few decades with the mechanization of logging. Elephants and their mahouts have been forced to look for work in tourism and religious festivals, jobs which elephants find terribly stressful.

The Elephant Camp's main strength comes from adding +1 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture to Lumber Mills. This adds a lot of value to these already strong improvments, so from the start of the game, strongly prioritize settling near Forests and Jungles and avoid chopping them down. Additionally, try to maintain many City-State Allies that have access to Strategic Resources to benefit from the +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production and [ICON_GOLD] Gold in every Elephant Camp for each. This Building will likely always be a priority to build as the base is already strong, so think about how you can research Technologies to unlock it as soon as possible.

Despite Siam's remarkable diplomacy, they did occasionally come into conflict with the western imperial powers which threated their independence. When the French set their sights on Laos, the Siamese mistakenly believed the English would support them against France and prepared for war. The Suea Mop ("Crouching Tiger") were the most technologically advanced cannons in the Siamese arsenal at the time; coastal artillery which could destroy any French boats foolish enough to enter their harbours. However, no amount of raw power can account for corruption and disorganization; the French managed to establish their beachheads, and the coastal artillery of Thailand remained unused. It turns out that the finest artillery money can buy still needs to be fired.

Suea Mop lacks the Combat Strength bonus when attacking Cities, making it similar to a normal Ranged Unit. However, it deals an extra 15 damage to Units if it hasn't moved before attacking on the turn. This ignores damage reduction and high combat strength of attacked Units, so it effectively makes Suea Mop just as effective when attacking Cities (the extra damage is dealt to all garrisons) and very effective when fighting Units, especially if they are more advanced than you. Furthermore, the Coastal Artillery Promotion is powerful when using Suea Mop as coastal defense, so your Cities with water access are safer than they otherwise would be. As it has low Combat Strength, to avoid moving before attacking you will have to carefully position your army.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]For Promotions, Logistics has the strongest synergy with Suea Mop because you can apply the 15 damage twice per turn, or you can move after attacking which will not affect this bonus next turn. Alternatively, the Range Promotion will allow you to be stationary with more safety giving more reliability in dealing the bonus damage.

Gumeys were riverside entrepots used to conduct goods and soldiers back and forth along the Niger river before they were loaded onto camels for the arduous journey across the open desert. Even before gaining their independence from the Mali Empire, the Songhai had become fantastically wealthy off the trade of gold, salt, and slaves from the Trans-Saharan trade routes. The Songhai's seat of power lay at the edge of the vast Saharan desert, acting as a waystation between the Taghazan salt mines to the north, the gold mines in the southwest, and distant markets in Egypt and the Middle East.

Sofa is a Mandinka term for slave soldiers who served in the army of the various Empires of West Africa. Originally, the Sofas were horse grooms of the soldier-nobility, the Farari, but their role slowly changed to become skirmishers and soldiers in their own right. Sofas were recruited from "jonow" (slaves) captured in battle or bought from afar. The institution of slavery in the Mali and Songhai Empires heavily rewarded loyalty, and jonow could rise to civil or military positions of prominence. Jonow became part of their master's clan, and were often freed after a certain amount of years.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Sofas were equipped with two quivers, and their bow was small by European standards, so sofas employed deadly poisons and fired in arcs to give their arrows strength.

{TXT_KEY_IMPROVEMENT_HACIENDA_HELP}[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]하시엔다는 스페인인들이 원주민들로부터 자원을 얻고 관리하기 위해 건설한 식민지이다. 하시엔다는 이전의 엔코미엔다 제도에 의해 기술된 토착 노동력의 엄격한 부여보다는 재산과 기업의 부여에 기반을 두었다. 하시엔다는 일반적으로 큰 사유지였지만, 그 일의 성격은 플랜테이션, 광업, 공장까지 다양했다.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]하시엔다의 소유자는 하켄다도라고 불렸지만, 부유한 지주들은 그들의 소유지를 거의 방문하지 않았고 근처의 도시에서 사는 것을 선호했다. 하시엔다의 일상적인 운영은 고용된 관리자의 책임이었다. 몇몇 비정상적으로 크고 수익성이 높은 아시엔다들은 로마 가톨릭 교회의 재산이었고, 토착 노동자들과 그들의 기독교 작업 주인들 사이의 긴장을 악화시켰다.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]아시엔다 제도는 스페인 제국이 해체된 후 대부분의 국가에서 폐지되었지만, 결과는 엇갈렸다. 대규모 사유지를 자급자족하는 농부들을 위한 개별 소유지로 분리하려는 노력은 일부 남미 국가들에서 극심한 빈곤을 초래했다. 이와는 대조적으로, 라틴 아메리카와 필리핀의 하시엔다는 대부분 온전하게 남아있었지만, 그들의 식민지 시대에 대한 동일한 법적 지위나 허가가 없었다.
다른 하시엔다와 서로 인접하여 건설할 수 없습니다. [ICON_CULTURE] 문화가 증가하고 인접한 다음 타일들이 하시엔다에 추가 산출량을 제공합니다: [NEWLINE]보너스 자원 : +3 [ICON_FOOD]식량[NEWLINE]전략 자원 : +3 [ICON_PRODUCTION]생산[NEWLINE]사치 자원 : +3 [ICON_GOLD]골드
인접한 보너스 자원마다 [ICON_FOOD]식량 +3, 인접한 전략 자원마다 [ICON_PRODUCTION]생산 +3, 인접한 사치 자원마다 [ICON_GOLD]골드 +3을 제공합니다.
현재 타일의 [ICON_CULTURE] 문화를 증가시킵니다.[NEWLINE]보너스 자원과 인접 시 [ICON_FOOD]식량, 전략 자원과 인접 시 [ICON_PRODUCTION]생산, 사치 자원과 인접 시 [ICON_GOLD]골드, 도시와 인접 시 [ICON_CULTURE]문화를 제공합니다.

An exceptionally old and irrepressible institution, Spanish bullfighting can trace its roots back to pre-Roman pagan bull cults. The modern incarnation of Spanish bullfighting traces its roots to the ceremonial and stylistic innovations of virtuoso bullfighters and the construction of the first dedicated Bullrings in the late 1700s. From there, Spain's bullfighting traditions have spread to all of her former colonies.

The "Great and Most Fortunate Navy", the Spanish Armada, was a fleet of 130 ships constructed for the invasion of England and the overthrow the tyrannical Reformist, Elizabeth I. The Armada was one of the largest fleets ever seen in Europe, raised at great expense by Philip II in retribution for England's break from the Catholic Church, their execution of Mary, Queen of Scots, their support for the Dutch revolt against Spain, and the illegitimacy of Elizabeth I.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Spanish ships were outnumbered by England's navy, but they easily outgunned the smaller English vessels. In the end, however, it was not firepower, but speed which won the day, allowing the small English vessels to harry the lumbering Spanish Juggernaut, sinking 10 ships. When finally forced to retire to Spain, a navigational error blew the Armada off-course and onto the Irish coast, where fierce storms dashed the ships against the rocks. When the Armada managed to reach Spain, only 67 of the original 130 ships remained, full of sickly, starving, and demoralized sailors.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]The lessons of the Spanish Armada informed naval strategy for the next two centuries. Cannons and ranged action had now overtaken boarding and ramming as the primary methods of attack; sinking, rather than capturing, was now the priority. With this stunning victory, England had wrested naval dominance from Spain, a lead they would maintain until the rise of the United States in WWII.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]"I sent the Armada against men, not God's winds and waves".[NEWLINE][TAB]- Philip II

The Swedish Bad Stuga (bath cabin), or Bastu, is a small cabin designed as a bathing and dry heat spa. A stove or furnace heats the room to 200°F before patrons enter, where they will recline and sweat. Bastus are a social affair, places for discussion and relaxation with family and friends, but were also places for food curing and childbirth in earlier times.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]It is not known where or when Scandinavian sweat baths were first created, but it was well before the Christianization of Scandinavia, as evidenced by their ubiquity throughout medieval Europe. By the time written accounts first described Scandinavian sweat baths, Nordic countries had already created varied and distinct cultures surrounding them.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]The health benefits of heat baths are many and varied. Sessions have been shown to relieve cold symptoms and increase pain thresholds. They also help with rheumatic pain and fatigue, and may even reduce the risk of dementia. Prolonged use of a sauna has been linked to reduced male fertility, however, and heat baths should never be enjoyed while under the effects of alcohol.

The Nobel Prizes are awards administered by the Nobel Foundation and granted in accordance with the principle of "for the greatest benefit to humankind". The prizes were first awarded in 1901, marking the fifth anniversary of Alfred Nobel's death. Each laureate is required to give a public lecture on a subject related to the topic of their prize. The laureates are given a sum of money when they receive their prizes, depending upon how much money the Nobel Foundation can award each year. As of 2023, the monetary award per prize category is 11 million Swedish kronor (SEK), equivalent to approximately US$ 1.035 million. After the award ceremony in Sweden, a banquet is held in the Blue Hall at the Stockholm City Hall, which is attended by the Swedish Royal Family and around 1,300 guests. The Nobel Peace Prize banquet is held in Norway at the Oslo Grand Hotel after the award ceremony. The Nobel Prizes are widely regarded as the most prestigious awards available in their respective fields, and play a major role in the academic calendar and are widely reported on globally.
피아자 산 마르코(산 마르코 광장)는 이탈리아 베네치아의 광장입니다. 도시의 다른 모든 공간은 "캄피"(밭)라고 불립니다. 피아제타('작은 광장')는 광장의 남동쪽 구석에 있는 석호를 향해 연장된 것입니다. 이 두 공간은 함께 베네치아의 사회적, 종교적, 정치적 중심지를 형성하며 일반적으로 함께 건설됩니다.

{TXT_KEY_BUILDING_NATIONAL_EPIC}를 대체하는 베네치아의 고유 건물입니다. {TXT_KEY_BUILDING_PIAZZA_SAN_MARCO}는 {TXT_KEY_BUILDING_NATIONAL_EPIC}의 보너스에 더해, 추가로 [ICON_FOOD] 식량, [ICON_PRODUCTION] 생산, [ICON_GOLD] 골드, [ICON_RESEARCH] 과학, [ICON_CITY_SECURITY] 도시 보안,[ICON_WAR] 군사 유닛 보급 한도, 도시의 [ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE] 위인 생성 속도를 증가시킵니다. 또한 민간 유닛 구매 대기시간을 감소시키고, 군사 유닛 구매 대기시간을 제거합니다. [COLOR_CYAN]길드[ENDCOLOR]를 연구하면 베네치아의 세 고유 건물 중 하나를 건설할 수 있는 능력을 잠금 해제합니다. {TXT_KEY_BUILDING_NATIONAL_EPIC}와 달리, {TXT_KEY_BUILDING_PIAZZA_SAN_MARCO}는 [COLOR_CYAN]{TXT_KEY_TECH_WRITING_TITLE}[ENDCOLOR] 연구 시 생산이 가능하며, {TXT_KEY_BUILDING_MONUMENT}를 요구하지 않습니다. 하지만 [ICON_CAPITAL] 수도에만 건설할 수 있습니다.

[ICON_CAPITAL] 수도[ENDCOLOR]에만 건설할 수 있습니다.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]도시의 [ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE]위인 출현율이 [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]33%[ENDCOLOR] 증가합니다. 도시에 [ICON_CITIZEN] 시민이 탄생할 때마다 [ICON_CULTURE] 문화를 15 얻습니다. 정책을 채택할 때마다 [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] 황금기 점수를 50 얻습니다. [COLOR:105:105:105:255](시대별 보정)[ENDCOLOR] [ICON_WAR] 군사 유닛 보급 한도가 [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]5[ENDCOLOR] 증가합니다. [ICON_CITY_SECURITY] 도시 보안이 10 증가합니다. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]도시의 민간 유닛 구매 대기시간이 3턴으로 감소하고, 군사 유닛 구매 대기시간은 사라집니다.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_RESEARCH_STORED]{TXT_KEY_TECH_GUILDS_TITLE}[ENDCOLOR]를 연구하면 [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]{TXT_KEY_BUILDING_MURANO_GLASSWORKS}[ENDCOLOR], [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]{TXT_KEY_BUILDING_ARSENALE_DI_VENEZIA}[ENDCOLOR], [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]{TXT_KEY_BUILDING_RIALTO_DISTRICT}[ENDCOLOR] 중 하나를 건설할 수 있습니다.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]문명에 도시가 많을수록 건설에 필요한 [ICON_PRODUCTION]생산이 증가합니다.

리알토는 수세기 동안 베네치아의 금융과 상업의 중심지였고 지금도 그렇습니다. 리알토는 시장과 대운하를 가로지르는 리알토 다리로도 유명한 이탈리아 베네치아의 산 폴로 세스티에 지역입니다. 이 지역은 리오 부시니아쿠스의 양쪽에 있는 레알티네 제도 중앙의 작은 지역이 리보알투스 또는 "높은 은행"으로 알려졌을 때 9세기에 정착했습니다. 결국 부시니아쿠스는 대운하로 알려지게 되었고, 리알토 지역은 왼쪽 둑의 지역만을 지칭하게 되었습니다.

아스넬 디 베네치아는 이탈리아 북부 베네치아 시에 있는 옛 조선소와 무기고가 모여 있는 복합 건물입니다. 국가 소유의 이 건물은 서기 2천년 중반 동안 베네치아 공화국의 해군 전력 대부분을 책임졌습니다. 그것은 역사상 최초의 대규모 산업체 중 하나였습니다.

유리 제조의 중심지로서의 무라노의 명성은 화재와 도시의 대부분 목조 건물의 파괴를 두려워한 베네치아 공화국이 1291년 유리 제조자들에게 그들의 주조 공장을 무라노로 옮기라고 명령하면서 탄생했습니다. 무라노 유리공방은 여전히 베네치아 유리와 관련이 있습니다. 무라노의 유리 제조업자들은 곧 섬의 가장 유명한 시민들 중 한 명으로 꼽혔습니다. 14세기까지 유리 제조업자들은 검을 착용할 수 있었고, 베네치아 국가로부터 기소 면제를 받았으며, 그들의 딸들은 베네치아의 가장 부유한 가문과 결혼했습니다. 특정 법적 특권의 혜택을 받는 대신, 유리 제조업자들은 공화국을 떠나는 것이 금지되었습니다. 하지만, 그들 중 다수는 이주와 관련된 위험을 감수하고 주변 도시와 더 먼 곳, 심지어 영국과 네덜란드에도 유리 용광로를 설립했습니다.

Fusta, or galliots, were small galleys with no more than 35 sailors. Exceptionally light and fast, the Venetians originally used them to maintain a standing navy against pirates, but the ship quickly became a favorite of the pirates themselves. The shallow draft, maneuverability and speed of the Fusta made them a legend throughout the Mediterranean.

An Iziko is a simple hearth used as a gathering place for Zulu communities. The fireplace was revered as a source for food, warmth, dreams, and ancestral ties. It is from these gatherings that a sense of community and identity was formed, and young Zulus could perform and bond.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]The fireplace is used metaphorically for the "cooking of songs" in isicathamiya stage performances, a modern offshoot of traditional Zulu music. Dreams were an essential part of communicating with ancestors and formed part of a deeply rooted Zulu religion. Some isicathamiya musicians claim some of their songs were created in the spiritual realm or given to them by their ancestors.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]"A person is a person because of other people"[NEWLINE][TAB]- Zulu proverb

An InDuna can widely be translated to any leader of men, in commerce, in politics, and in war. An InDuna guided each regiment, or 'ibutho', of young Zulu men and he in turn answered to senior izinDuna who controlled the corps. One or more of these elder chiefs might accompany a big force on an important mission, but there was no single "field marshal" in command of all Zulu forces. Regimental izinDuna, like the non-commissioned officers of today's army, were important for morale and discipline. This was demonstrated during the battle of Isandlwana, where the army led by Ntshingwayo kaMahole outmaneuvered and destroyed a British column. Ntshingwayo kaMahole and his fellow izinDuna snuck a Zulu force of 20 000 men behind the British, hiding them in a valley only 7 miles from the British camp. When discovered sitting in complete silence by scouts, the izinDuna spurred their men into action and closed the remaining distance with lightning speed.

{TXT_KEY_IMPROVEMENT_ISIBAYA_HELP}[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]An Isibaya is a Zulu homestead and defensive structure. The Isibaya is laid out in a circular pattern with a cattle enclosure at the centre, ringed by huts, palisades, and mud walls. The layout and function are reminiscent of a European corral, hence the Afrikaans term for Amabaya, "Kraal".[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Cattle were central to the life and economy of the Zulu Kingdom. Cattle were a sign of status, wealth, and power, and were instrumental for feeding and arming the amabutho regiments of the Zulu army.
